answer:
Adults who were immunized against tetanus and diphtheria when they were younger should get a booster dose of the Td vaccine every 10 years. The Td vaccine is free. A booster dose of the Tdap vaccine (which contains pertussis and you would have received in grade 9) is recommended for adults who were immunized in childhood but is not provided for free in B.C.  Please speak to your immunization provider to determine which is your best option. You will find more information here.
Immunization Nurse
question: If I last had my boosters in grade 9 at what age should I get my next ones? 22?
question_variation_0: at what age should  i get my next boosters grade 21
question_variation_1: at what age should y grade x 21 at age should  i get my boosters in grade 9 at 22.
question_variation_2: at what age should i get my next boosters 22? 21
